channel.title: Consulting on Spencer Braun
channel.description: Recent content in Consulting on Spencer Braun

item.title: Lessons from Statistical Consulting
item.description: The Stanford Statistics department offers a unique service; any and all researchers from across the university can come discuss their ideas with Master’s and PhD students. Eager to see whether I could apply my coursework to actual questions of experimental design, inference, and prediction, I signed up to be a consultant for the quarter. The experience was as challenging as I had expected, but the difficulty did not stem from choosing the best model or interpreting p-values.
